pages.text: Kare (nufu) wa itta. `Kare-ra ga okonatte iru koto ni tsuite, watashi ga nani o shirimashou ka
Kare-ra no seisan wa, tada watashi no omo ni zokusuru nodesu. Moshi anata gataga rikai surunaraba
Mata watashi wa, shinko suru mono-tachi o oiharaimasen
Watashi wa komeina hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai nodesu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga tomenainara, nufu yo, kanarazu ishi-uchi ni sa rerudeshou
Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, hontoni watashi no min wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to moshimasu
Sorede watashi to kare-ra no ma o, shikkari o sabaki kudasare, watashi to, watashi to issho no shinja-tachi o sukutte kudasai
Sokode ware wa kare to, kare to issho no mono-tachi o, mansai shita fune no naka ni sukutte yatta
Sorekara ware wa ato ni nokotta-sha-tachi o obore saseta
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru
Ado (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Kare-ra no doho no fudo ga kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokose. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka
Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Mata watashi wa, kono koto de anata gata ni hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Anata gata wa kochi to iu kochi ni itazura ni ishibumi o tateru nodesu ka
Mata anata gata wa (eien ni) sumou to shite, kengona koro o tateru nodesu ka
Anata gata wa boryoku o fuu toki, bogyaku-sha no yo ni furumau nodesu ka
Arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Anata gata ga shiru hodo no mono o, sadzuke rareru-kata o osore nasai
Kare wa kazukazu no kachiku to shison o, anata gata ni sadzuke rare
mata kaju-en ya izumi o mo sadzuke rareta
Watashi wa anata gata ni kuwae rareru idaina hi no chobatsu o hontoni osoreru
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga sekkyo shite mo sekkyo shinakute mo, watashi-tachi ni totte wa onaji kotodesu
